Description_lang: The essence of Ansurek's acolyte vaporizes, inflicting $460354s1 Shadow damage to all players and slowing their movement speed by $s1% for $d. This effect stacks.Ansurek consumes this vapor, increasing her damage done by $445880s1% for $445880d. This effect stacks.
